headline: Josh Brown's 'Best Stocks in the Market': CBRE Group
summary: Josh Brown, CEO of Ritholtz Wealth Management, joins CNBC's "Halftime Report" to spotlight CBRE Group in his "Best Stocks in the Market." The Committee debate their Real Estate Strategy.

headline: Office, retail to see more leasing as market recovery continues: CBRE
summary: The pricing gap between prime and non-prime office assets is expected to widen, creating demand in the next tier of space, the company says.
